Class Ground

  • java.lang.Object

    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Brick, Crater, Crop, Dirt, Fence, Floor, Floor, LockedDoor, Tree, Tree, Wall

    public abstract class Ground
extends java.lang.Object
implements GroundInterface, Capable, Printable
    Class representing terrain type
